content: By the year 1910, the book "Alice in Wonderland" had already been translated into the following languages: German, French, Swedish, Italian, Russian, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Finnish and Esperanto.
translations: ita:Nel 1910 il libro Alice nel paese delle meraviglie era già stato tradotto nelle seguenti lingue﹕ tedesco, francese, sved
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by araneo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
